thread.title: President Says White House Runs Like a 'Fine-Tuned Machine,' Gets Roasted For It | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: President Says White House Runs Like a 'Fine-Tuned Machine,' Gets Roasted For It | The Daily Dot

author: David Covucci
title: President Says White House Runs Like a 'Fine-Tuned Machine,' Gets Roasted For It | The Daily Dot
text:
Many people online instantly contested this claim with good tweets. 
President Trump said a lot of eyebrow-raising things in his wide-ranging, 77-minute press conference today. 
There were... well, we've got a recap of all of it right here . There's a lot! 
But Twitter jumped on one phrase the president kept returning to. 
At least twice during the presser, in response to stories about chaos in his administration , the president declared that his office ran like a "fine-tuned machine." Pres. Trump: "This administration is running like a fine-tuned machine, despite the fact that I can't get my cabinet approved." pic.twitter.com/Rtj3jSN09o ‚Äî ABC News (@ABC) February 16, 2017 Savvy and humor-inclined web users jumped all over it. "This administration is running like a fine-tuned machine," says trump. So was the Titanic. Both known for huge leaks & sinking fast. Do you think the GIFs about it were great? The GIFs were GREAT. FAKE NEWS: Trump - ‚ÄúThis administration is running like a fine-tuned machine.‚ÄùReal news: see below pic.twitter.com/qSGAOQ65RT ‚Äî Stop Trump üç∑ (@StopTrump2020) February 16, 2017 "My administration is running like a fine-tuned machine."
